parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of results to skip from the beginning of the available set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to read from the available set

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A specification of one or more fields to sort results by. Of format `<field> [asc | desc]`. Sortable Fields: [active, createdfrom, name]

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A specification of search terms to filter results by

parameters.name: activeOnly
parameters.description: Specify whether to only display active groups [true, false]
